thread.title: 'Girls' star Jemima Kirke chops off hair while topless in video
thread.title_full: 'Girls' star Jemima Kirke chops off hair while topless in video | Fox News

author: FoxNews.com
title: 'Girls' star Jemima Kirke chops off hair while topless in video
text:
Published October 21, 2015 FoxNews.com Facebook 0 Twitter 0 livefyre Email Print Cast member of the HBO show Girls Jemima Kirke arrives for the premiere of the third season of the show in New York January 6, 2014. (Reuters)
"Girls" star Jemima Kirke shared a video of herself chopping off her hair.
While topless.
"Long hair. Don't care," Kirke wrote Wednesday on Twitter. "Going for the mom-who-had-a-tough-year-who-doesn't-feel-like-brushing-her-f---ing-hair look."
Long hair. Don't care. Going for the mom-who-had-a-tough-year-who-doesn't-feel-like-brushing-her-fucking-hair look. pic.twitter.com/6DXZZDfLM3
â€” Jemima Kirke (@jemimakirke) October 21, 2015
The British-born beauty's hair used to reach her hips, but she cut her blonde locks just past her shoulder.
She plays Lena Dunham's character's cousin Jessa Johansson on the HBO show.
Kirke has two children with lawyer husband Michael Mosberg. They welcomed daughter Rafaella Israel in 2010, and son Memphis Kirke in 2012.
